body_html: I don't lose the pickle but I think it is better to save also another one at an intermediate point. What happens if people doesn't run the pickle step? You have a safe condition for not run again the download but some cell are also heavy so it is safer to save train and test set as soon are formed.

body: I don't lose the pickle but I think it is better to save also another one at an intermediate point. What happens if people doesn't run the pickle step? You have a safe condition  for not run again the download but some cell are also heavy so it is safer to save train and test set as soon are formed.
